mapper.sql: select id, cus_code, order_no, entry_time, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, del_flag from smt_order_entry
mapper.select: SELECT e.cus_code, e.order_no, e.entry_time, e.create_by, e.create_time, b.bom_name, el.id, el.entry_id, el.order_type, el.bom_id, el.order_qty, el.remark FROM `smt_order_entry` e LEFT JOIN `smt_order_entry_line` el ON e.id = el.entry_id AND el.del_flag = 0 LEFT join `smt_bom` b on el.bom_id = b.id and b.del_flag = 0 WHERE e.del_flag = 0 and e.cus_code = #{cusCode} and b.bom_name like concat('%',#{bomName},'%') and el.order_type = #{orderType} order by e.create_time desc

SELECT e.cus_code, el.order_type, el.bom_id, sum(el.order_qty) as sumOrderQty, d.dzl_name, d.type_name FROM `smt_order_entry` e LEFT JOIN `smt_order_entry_line` el ON e.id = el.entry_id AND el.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN smt_dzl d ON el.bom_id = d.id AND d.del_flag = 0 WHERE e.del_flag = 0 and e.cus_code = #{cusCode} and d.dzl_name like concat('%',#{dzlName},'%') and el.order_type = #{orderType} GROUP BY cus_code,bom_id

SELECT e.cus_code, e.order_no, e.entry_time, l.bom_id, l.order_qty FROM `smt_order_entry` e LEFT JOIN smt_order_entry_line l ON e.id = l.entry_id AND l.del_flag = 0 WHERE e.del_flag = 0 AND l.order_type = 2 and e.cus_code = #{cusCode} and l.bom_id = #{bomId}
AND date_format(e.entry_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(e.entry_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
ORDER BY e.cus_code, l.bom_id, e.entry_time
